verses.text: I will \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* upon my \w watch|strong="H4931"\w*, and \w set|strong="H3320"\w* me upon the \w tower|strong="H4692"\w*, and will \w watch|strong="H6822"\w* to \w see|strong="H7200"\w* what he will \w say|strong="H1696"\w* unto me, and what I shall \w answer|strong="H7725"\w* when I am \w reproved|strong="H8433"\w*.\f + \fr 2.1 \ft tower: Heb. fenced place\f*\f + \fr 2.1 \ft unto me: or, in me\f*\f + \fr 2.1 \ft when…: or, when I am argued with: Heb. upon my reproof, or, arguing\f*

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* me, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Write|strong="H3789"\w* the \w vision|strong="H2377"\w*, and make \add it\add* \w plain|strong="H0874"\w* upon \w tables|strong="H3871"\w*, that he may \w run|strong="H7323"\w* that \w readeth|strong="H7121"\w* it.

For the \w vision|strong="H2377"\w* \add is\add* yet for an appointed \w time|strong="H4150"\w*, but at the \w end|strong="H7093"\w* it shall \w speak|strong="H6315"\w*, and not \w lie|strong="H3576"\w*: though it \w tarry|strong="H4102"\w*, \w wait|strong="H2442"\w* for it; because it will \w surely|strong="H0935"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, it will not \w tarry|strong="H0309"\w*.

Behold, his \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \add which\add* is lifted \w up|strong="H6075"\w* is not \w upright|strong="H3474"\w* in him: but the \w just|strong="H6662"\w* shall \w live|strong="H2421"\w* by his \w faith|strong="H0530"\w*.

¶ Yea also, because he \w transgresseth|strong="H0898"\w* by \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*, \add he is\add* a \w proud|strong="H3093"\w* \w man|strong="H1397"\w*, neither keepeth at \w home|strong="H5115"\w*, who \w enlargeth|strong="H7337"\w* his \w desire|strong="H5315"\w* as \w hell|strong="H7585"\w*, and \add is\add* as \w death|strong="H4194"\w*, and cannot be \w satisfied|strong="H7646"\w*, but \w gathereth|strong="H0622"\w* unto him all \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, and \w heapeth|strong="H6908"\w* unto him all \w people|strong="H5971"\w*:\f + \fr 2.5 \ft Yea…: or, How much more\f*

Shall not all these take \w up|strong="H5375"\w* a \w parable|strong="H4912"\w* against him, and a \w taunting|strong="H4426"\w* \w proverb|strong="H2420"\w* against him, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Woe|strong="H1945"\w* to him that \w increaseth|strong="H7235"\w* \add that which is\add* not his! how long? and to him that \w ladeth|strong="H3513"\w* himself with thick \w clay|strong="H5671"\w*!\f + \fr 2.6 \ft Woe…: or, Ho, he\f*

Shall they not rise \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w suddenly|strong="H6621"\w* that shall \w bite|strong="H5391"\w* thee, and \w awake|strong="H3364"\w* that shall \w vex|strong="H2111"\w* thee, and thou shalt be for \w booties|strong="H4933"\w* unto them?

Because thou hast \w spoiled|strong="H7997"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, all the \w remnant|strong="H3499"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* shall \w spoil|strong="H7997"\w* thee; because of \w men’s|strong="H0120"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, and \add for\add* the \w violence|strong="H2555"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, of the \w city|strong="H7151"\w*, and of all that \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* therein.\f + \fr 2.8 \ft blood: Heb. bloods\f*

¶ \w Woe|strong="H1945"\w* to him that \w coveteth|strong="H1214"\w* an \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w covetousness|strong="H1215"\w* to his \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, that he may \w set|strong="H7760"\w* his \w nest|strong="H7064"\w* on \w high|strong="H4791"\w*, that he may be \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* from the \w power|strong="H3709"\w* of \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*!\f + \fr 2.9 \ft coveteth…: or, gaineth and evil gain\f*\f + \fr 2.9 \ft power…: Heb. palm of the hand\f*

Thou hast \w consulted|strong="H3289"\w* \w shame|strong="H1322"\w* to thy \w house|strong="H1004"\w* by cutting \w off|strong="H7096"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and hast \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w* \add against\add* thy \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*.

For the \w stone|strong="H0068"\w* shall cry \w out|strong="H2199"\w* of the \w wall|strong="H7023"\w*, and the beam \w out|strong="H3714"\w* of the \w timber|strong="H6086"\w* shall \w answer|strong="H6030"\w* it.\f + \fr 2.11 \ft beam: or, piece, or, fastening\f*\f + \fr 2.11 \ft answer it: or, witness against it\f*

¶ \w Woe|strong="H1945"\w* to him that \w buildeth|strong="H1129"\w* a \w town|strong="H5892"\w* with \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, and \w stablisheth|strong="H3559"\w* a \w city|strong="H7151"\w* by \w iniquity|strong="H5766"\w*!\f + \fr 2.12 \ft blood: Heb. bloods\f*

Behold, \add is it\add* not of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* that the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* shall \w labour|strong="H3021"\w* in the \w very|strong="H1767"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, and the \w people|strong="H3816"\w* shall \w weary|strong="H3286"\w* themselves for \w very|strong="H1767"\w* \w vanity|strong="H7385"\w*?\f + \fr 2.13 \ft for…: or, in vain?\f*

For the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* shall be \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* with the \w knowledge|strong="H3045"\w* of the \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, as the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w cover|strong="H3680"\w* the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*.\f + \fr 2.14 \ft with…: or, by knowing the glory\f*

¶ \w Woe|strong="H1945"\w* unto him that giveth his \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w* \w drink|strong="H8248"\w*, that \w puttest|strong="H5596"\w* thy \w bottle|strong="H2573"\w* to \add him\add*, and makest \add him\add* \w drunken|strong="H7937"\w* also, that thou mayest \w look|strong="H5027"\w* on their \w nakedness|strong="H4589"\w*!

Thou art \w filled|strong="H7646"\w* with \w shame|strong="H7036"\w* for \w glory|strong="H3519"\w*: \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* thou also, and let thy foreskin be \w uncovered|strong="H6188"\w*: the \w cup|strong="H3563"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* shall be \w turned|strong="H5437"\w* unto thee, and shameful \w spewing|strong="H7022"\w* \add shall be\add* on thy \w glory|strong="H3519"\w*.\f + \fr 2.16 \ft with…: or, more with shame than with glory\f*

For the \w violence|strong="H2555"\w* of \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w* shall \w cover|strong="H3680"\w* thee, and the \w spoil|strong="H7701"\w* of \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w*, \add which\add* made them \w afraid|strong="H2865"\w*, because of \w men’s|strong="H0120"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, and for the \w violence|strong="H2555"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, of the \w city|strong="H7151"\w*, and of all that \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* therein.

¶ What \w profiteth|strong="H3276"\w* the graven \w image|strong="H6459"\w* that the \w maker|strong="H3335"\w* thereof hath \w graven|strong="H6458"\w* it; the molten \w image|strong="H4541"\w*, and a \w teacher|strong="H3384"\w* of \w lies|strong="H8267"\w*, that the \w maker|strong="H3335"\w* of his \w work|strong="H3336"\w* \w trusteth|strong="H0982"\w* therein, to \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w dumb|strong="H0483"\w* \w idols|strong="H0457"\w*?\f + \fr 2.18 \ft maker of…: Heb. fashioner of his fashion\f*

\w Woe|strong="H1945"\w* unto him that \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* to the \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*, \w Awake|strong="H6974"\w*; to the \w dumb|strong="H1748"\w* \w stone|strong="H0068"\w*, \w Arise|strong="H5782"\w*, it shall \w teach|strong="H3384"\w*! Behold, it \add is\add* \w laid|strong="H8610"\w* over with \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* and \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, and \add there is\add* no \w breath|strong="H7307"\w* at all in the \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* of it.

But the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* in his \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w temple|strong="H1964"\w*: let all the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* keep \w silence|strong="H2013"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him.\f + \fr 2.20 \ft let…: Heb. be silent all the earth before him\f*
